item.title: GitHub Copilot Customization: Instructions, Prompts, Agents and Skills
item.description: We’re approaching the end of 2025, this has been a year of agents, for sure.

item.title: Monitoring GitHub Copilot Adoption with Metrics
item.description:
Introduction

Since GitHub released the Copilot usage metrics dashboard and API in public preview back in October, I’ve been spending a lot of time helping enterprise administrators understand Copilot’s impact using these metrics.
